introduction.clause_text: This Business Associate Agreement is entered into as of [EFFECTIVE DATE] by and between [COVERED ENTITY] and [BUSINESS ASSOCIATE], collectively referred to as the Parties.

whereas_covered_entity.clause_text: Covered Entity is a Covered Entity as defined under HIPAA Privacy and Security Standards.

whereas_business_associate.clause_text: Business Associate is a Business Associate as defined under HIPAA and may access, use, maintain or disclose PHI on behalf of Covered Entity.

whereas_hipaa_compliance.clause_text: Business Associate must comply with HIPAA and agree in writing to mandatory provisions governing PHI use and disclosure.

whereas_part2_optional.clause_text: If applicable, Covered Entity operates a substance abuse treatment program governed by 42 C.F.R. Part 2.

definitions.clause_text: Terms not otherwise defined shall have the meanings assigned under HIPAA Privacy and Security Standards.

scope_of_phi.clause_text: All PHI disclosed, created, accessed, used, transmitted or maintained by Business Associate on behalf of Covered Entity shall be subject to this Agreement.

permitted_uses.clause_text: Business Associate may use or disclose PHI solely to perform services for Covered Entity as permitted by this Agreement.

administrative_uses.clause_text: Business Associate may use PHI for management, legal responsibilities, and data aggregation as permitted by law.

use_restrictions.clause_text: Business Associate may not use or disclose PHI in any manner that would violate HIPAA or Covered Entity policies.

minimum_necessary.clause_text: Business Associate must comply with minimum necessary standards when using or disclosing PHI.

safeguards.clause_text: Business Associate shall implement administrative, physical and technical safeguards to protect PHI.

breach_reporting.clause_text: Business Associate must report unauthorized use or disclosure of PHI within ten (10) days and immediately for electronic PHI incidents.

subcontractors.clause_text: Business Associate must ensure subcontractors agree in writing to the same PHI restrictions.

individual_rights_support.clause_text: Business Associate shall support access, amendment and accounting of disclosures requests within ten (10) days.

judicial_requests.clause_text: Business Associate must notify Covered Entity of subpoenas and resist disclosure unless legally authorized.

qualified_service_org.clause_text: If Business Associate is a Qualified Service Organization, it shall comply with 42 C.F.R. Part 2 confidentiality rules.

term_and_termination.clause_text: This Agreement remains effective until PHI is returned or destroyed and may be terminated for cause or without cause.

post_termination_obligations.clause_text: Upon termination, PHI must be returned or destroyed or protections extended if infeasible.

indemnification.clause_text: Business Associate shall indemnify Covered Entity for damages arising from breach of this Agreement.

preemption.clause_text: HIPAA and stricter confidentiality laws shall control in case of inconsistency.

entire_agreement.clause_text: This Agreement represents the entire understanding between the Parties.

signatures.clause_text: The Parties execute this Agreement as of the dates below.
